SEARCH

Class CharacterAction

java.lang.Object
CharacterAction
public class CharacterAction extends Object
The CharacterAction class represents the actions and behaviors of characters in a game. It contains methods for setting enemies, choosing enemies and bosses, handling enemy behaviors, managing health points, leveling up, adding items, and using items.*

    • ChooseEnemy

      public Player ChooseEnemy(JLabel label, JLabel label2, JLabel text, JLabel label3)
      Chooses a random enemy and updates the UI labels and icons accordingly.
      Parameters:
      label - The label to display the enemy's icon.
      label2 - The label to display the enemy's name.
      text - The label to display the enemy's damage.
      label3 - The label to display the enemy's health.
      Returns:
      The chosen enemy.

    • ChooseBoss

      public Player ChooseBoss(JLabel label, JLabel label2, JLabel text, JLabel label3, int i)
      Chooses a boss enemy and updates the UI labels and icons accordingly.
      Parameters:
      label - The label to display the enemy's icon.
      label2 - The label to display the enemy's name.
      text - The label to display the enemy's damage.
      label3 - The label to display the enemy's health.
      i - The index of the chosen boss.
      Returns:
      The chosen boss enemy.

    • EnemyBehavior

      public int[] EnemyBehavior(int k1, int k2, int k3, int k4, double i)
      Determines the behavior of the enemy based on the provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      k1 - The weight for the first behavior type.
      k2 - The weight for the second behavior type.
      k3 - The weight for the third behavior type.
      k4 - The weight for the fourth behavior type.
      i - The random value to determine the behavior.
      Returns:
      An array representing the chosen behavior.

    • ChooseBehavior

      public int[] ChooseBehavior(Player enemy, CharacterAction action)
      Chooses the behavior for the given enemy.
      Parameters:
      enemy - The enemy for which to choose the behavior.
      action - The CharacterAction instance.
      Returns:
      An array representing the chosen behavior.

      enemyes - The array of enemies.
